meanings.definition: To make Catholic in character or doctrine.
meanings.sent1: She catholicizes her teachings by incorporating Catholic beliefs.
meanings.sent2: The priest catholicizes the church by adding traditional Catholic rituals.
meanings.sent3: The cat catholicizes the house by sleeping on the pew.
meanings.sent4: His love for history catholicizes his view of the world.
meanings.sent5: The old book catholicizes the reader with its religious themes.

meanings.definition: To bring under Catholic influence or control.
meanings.sent1: The missionary catholicizes the remote village through education.
meanings.sent2: The king catholicizes the region by building Catholic schools.
meanings.sent3: The dog catholicizes the park by chasing away other animals.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness catholicizes the hearts of those around her.
meanings.sent5: The music catholicizes the audience, filling them with peace.
